long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Connexease Mini Chrome Extension ‚Äì Revolutionize Your Communication!

Tired of toggling between different tabs and apps for managing your communication? Look no further! With Connexease Mini Chrome Extension, communication is seamless, efficient, and centralized, right at your fingertips.

üåê Unified Inbox: Activate Connexease Mini with just one click and manage WhatsApp, Instagram DM, Messenger, and more, all from a single screen. Say goodbye to constantly switching between apps, CRM, and various screens. Now, you can effortlessly handle orders and streamline communication without missing a beat.

üì• Maximize Inbox Efficiency: Take control of your conversations with the organized tab system of Connexease Mini Chrome Extension. Agents can efficiently process customer orders directly through the web interface, making communication a breeze.

‚öôÔ∏è Boost Productivity with Advanced Features: Unlock a range of powerful features like template messages, quick replies, and automatic assignments with Connexease Mini. Increase your productivity as you effortlessly manage your messages without the need to navigate away from your current workspace.

üí¨ Seamless CRM Integration: Reply to messages, assign tasks, and manage communications ‚Äì all within your CRM. The Mini Extension ensures a smooth workflow by allowing you to handle your tickets without leaving the CRM environment.

üîó Connexease Account Integration: To experience the full potential of the Mini Chrome Extension, you need a Connexease account. Don't have one yet? No worries! Reach out to us at demo@connexease.com to request a demo and explore the incredible capabilities firsthand.

üåê About Connexease: Revolutionize your customer care with Connexease ‚Äì a multi-channel, conversational support platform designed for the modern customer care domain. As a plug-and-play user interface for headless customer care support channels, Connexease collaborates seamlessly with brands and third-party outsourcing companies.

Upgrade your communication game with Connexease Mini Chrome Extension ‚Äì the ultimate solution for a connected and efficient workflow. Try it today and experience the future of communication!

How to get started:

- Click the "Add to Chrome" button in the upper right area of the page.
- Click the puzzle piece-shaped extensions icon in the upper right corner of your browser. Pin the Mini for ease of access.
- Enter the website you want to automatically open the Connexease Mini widget and click the "add to list" button.
- You can change the settings of the Connexease Mini Chrome Extension to suit your use.
Then, whenever you want to run, click its button in the Connexease Mini Extension
